snippet: Lucy Alibar, one of the writers of "Beasts of the Southern Wild," said she started shivering when she heard the news that she had been nominated for an Oscar. Her father started cursing, but that was a good thing.
abstract: Lucy Alibar, one of the writers of "Beasts of the Southern Wild," said she started shivering when she heard the news that she had been nominated for an Oscar. Her father started cursing, but that was a good thing.

headline.main: Screams and Curses: A 'Beast' Nominee Gets the News
